sentences.sContent: He was a natural politician, a gifted orator who knew how to work a crowd.
sentences.sCn: 他曾是位天生的政治家，是位有天赋且知道如何凝集民众的演说家。

synos.tran: 演说者；演讲者；雄辩家；原告

remMethod.val: ora (说话) + tor (…的人) → 说话的人 → 演说者

words.tran: 演说的；演说家的；雄辩的
演说，演讲；用演说的腔调说

trans.tranOther: someone who is good at making speeches and persuading people
